name: LD47 The Machine in the Woods
name_original: LD47 The Machine in the Woods
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 47 "Stuck in a loop"

The Abrams Machine has lurked in the Northern Woods for as long as anyone can remember. Why it was put there, what it does, or who made it are long-unsolved mysteries.  

What is known is that every twenty years, the Machine awakes and summons someone from one of the nearby villages to feed it with resources from the woods.  

And this year, it's your turn...  

  • Use the WASD keys to move around the woods. 
  • "," and "." rotate the camera. 
  • Click on items to interact with them. 
  •  An arrow floating above your head always points to the Machine.  
  • The Machine's gauge at the bottom-right of the screen lets you know how well satiated the Machine is. Be wary of letting the Machine's satiation get too low, for dire consequences await...
